quote_first: “Oh yes. His clocks were set at one minute past five,
quote_last: and seven minutes past five. That was the combination number of a safe, 515457. The safe was concealed behind a reproduction of the Mona Lisa. Inside the safe,” continued Poirot, with distaste, “were the Crown Jewels of the Russian Royal Family.”
title: The Clocks
author: Agatha Christie

quote_last: on the substandard clock radio. Because why do people always say the day starts now? Really it starts in the middle of the night at a fraction of a second past midnight.
title: The Accidental
author: Ali Smith
